column3: 5 Peel-Peel 2 garlic cloves
4 Chop-Chop 1 green chilli
1 Chop-Chop 1/4 medium onion
9 add-add 1/3 tsp salt to the bowl
7 Crack-Crack one egg in the bowl
8 add-add  1 tbsp milk to the bowl
10 Whisk-Whisk the egg mixture in the bowl
6 Mince-Mince peeled garlic cloves
3 Chop-Chop 1/4 tomato
2 Chop-Chop 1 tsp cilantro
11 Heat-Heat 2 tbsp oil in a heavy-bottomed or nonstick pan on medium heat
13 add-add chopped onions to the pan
14 Saute-Saute the onions on medium heat until they are soft and translucent
16 Add-Add chilli to the pan
15 Add-Add garlic to the pan
17 Cook-Cook for 1 minute, mixing everything
19 Add-Add tomatoes to the pan
20 Cook-Cook covered for 1 minute or until the tomatoes soften
21 pour-Slowly pour the whisked eggs into the pan
22 mixing-Keep mixing with a spatula for 3 minutes or until the eggs are almost cooked
23 Garnish-Garnish with 1 tbsp chopped cilantro and serve
12 add-add 1/3 tsp salt to the pan
